titles.title: First-Time Homebuyer Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require individuals to provide their Social Security number in order to claim the first-time homebuyer tax credit.
First-Time Homebuyer Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: First-Time Homebuyer Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny the first-time homebuyer tax credit to taxpayers who do not include their social security number on their tax return. Deems such requirement as met for joint tax returns if the social security number of either spouse is included.
